text: Damir Memović (born 19 January 1989), is a Serbian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Hoàng Anh Gia Lai. ==Career== ===Club=== On 31 July 2015, Memović was presented as a new signing for Gandzasar Kapan in the Armenian Premier League. After signing with Zvijezda 09 in September 2018, he left the club again at the end of the year, where his contract expired.Damir Memović napušta Zvijezdu 09: Imam nekoliko ponuda iz Premijer lige i inostranstva, sport1.oslobodjenje.ba, 10 December 2018 In 2019, he moved to Vietnam to play for Song Lam Nghe An and later joined Hoang Anh Gia Lai FC. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |valign="center"|Dolina Padina |2013–14 |Serbian First League |27||4|| || ||colspan="2"|–||27||4 |- |valign="center"|Drina Zvornik |2014–15 |Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina |23||2|| || ||colspan="2"|–||23||2 |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Gandzasar Kapan |2015–16 |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Armenian Premier League |23||2||4||0||colspan="2"|–||27||1 |- |2016–17 |29||1||1||0||colspan="2"|–||30||1 |- |2017–18 |19||0||5||0||2||0||26||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !71!!3!!10!!0!!2!!0!!84!!3 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !121!!9!!10!!0!!2!!0!!133!!9 |} ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian footballers Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Armenia Category:Serbian expatriate sportspeople in Armenia Category:FK Hajduk Beograd players Category:FK Sinđelić Beograd players Category:FK Dolina Padina players Category:FK Drina Zvornik players Category:FC Gandzasar Kapan players Category:Song Lam Nghe An F.C. players Category:Serbian expatriate sportspeople in Vietnam Category:Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina players Category:Armenian Premier League players Category:V.League 1 players Category:Association football defenders
